import React from 'react' import Forma from '../../Components/Main/Forma/Forma' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './project_1.css' function FirstProject() { const project = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.projectDataFirst) let MouseX = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.mouseX) let MouseY = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.mouseY) let radius = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.radius) const arrowProject = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.arrowProject) const Style = { opacity: '1', transition: 'transform 300ms ease-out 0s', transform: 'translate(0px, 0px)' } const imgStyle = { position: 'absolute', height: '100%', width: '100%', inset: '0px', objectFit: 'contain', color: 'transparent', } const {Links} = project const {ProjectToNumber} = project const handleMouseOver = (event) => { const targetRadius = 40; const duration = 1000; MouseX = event.clientX; MouseY = event.clientY; const startTime = performance.now(); const animateRadius = (currentTime) => { const elapsedTime = currentTime - startTime; const progress = elapsedTime / duration; if (progress >= 1) { radius = targetRadius; } else { radius = progress * targetRadius; requestAnimationFrame(animateRadius); } }; const clipPathValue = `${radius}px at ${MouseX}px ${MouseY}px`; console.log(clipPathValue); document.getElementById('h3-element').style.clipPath = `circle(${clipPathValue})`; requestAnimationFrame(animateRadius); }; return ( <>
